title: Home
text: As the Official Sports Drink of FIFA World Cup 2026â¢, POWERADE knows it takes more than skill to dominate the pitch â it takes endurance, focus, and the fuel to keep pushing until the final whistle. With 50% more electrolytes* than Gatorade Thirst Quencher, POWERADE is hydrating soccer's biggest names on the world's biggest stage. *Per 12 fl oz: Powerade - 240mg (Sodium), 80mg (Potassium); Gatorade Thirst Quencher - 160mg (Sodium), 50mg (Potassium)
